```{r}
library(eurostat)

library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)

```

```{r}
nama_10r_3gdp_linear_csv <- read_csv("nama_10r_3gdp_linear.csv.gz", 
    na = "NA")
```

```{r}
country_codes <- c("IT", "SE", "BE", "AT", "HR", "RS", "BA", "BG")
```

```{r}
# Subset of countries from 2000 to 2020
gdp_filtered <- nama_10r_3gdp_linear_csv |> 
    filter(TIME_PERIOD %in% c(2000:2020)) |> 
  filter(str_sub(geo, start = 1L, end = 2L) %in% c("IT", "SE", "BE", "AT", "HR", "RS", "BA", "BG")) |> 
  select(year = TIME_PERIOD, geo, OBS_VALUE, OBS_FLAG) 
  

```
